mapper.insert:
insert into test_paper ( id, topic_type, candidate_name, total_score, examination_time, title_number, subject, question_answer, choose_answer,
final_score,
score_per_question ) values ( #{id}, #{topicType}, #{candidateName}, #{totalScore}, #{examinationTime}, #{titleNumber}, #{subject}, #{questionAnswer}, #{chooseAnswer}, #{ finalScore}, #{ scorePerQuestion} )
mapper.delete:
delete from test_paper where id in
#{id}
